modName: Skyrim Meets Metal Main Menu Theme(331Erock)
summary: This is a simple mod that replaces the main menu theme music with a metal cover version.
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple mod that replaces the main menu theme music with a metal cover version.

Install instructions:
First of all I recommend using the download with NMM option, else:
If you downloaded this without the NMM then simply
extract the files and copy the "music" folder inside the "DATA" into
your Skyrim "Data" folder and overwrite the "mus_maintheme.xwm" file
if there is one or if you want to.

Uninstall instructions:
Go into your "Skyrim\Data\music\special\" folder and delete the "mus_maintheme.xwm" file.

Here is a youtube video of 331Erock playing the song for those interested:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yDE2VQzghp4
or
Click on the video tab above this description.

All credit goes to Erock @ http://www.shredguitareric.com/ who created the cover. All I did was convert it with the highest quality settings and packaged it.
author: TurboGamer
